Personal Projects

I am not an ordinary 9-5 developer. I stand for quality, and constantly seek ways to improve my skills as a developer. To do that, I have been developing a number of small software:

TDD
I wrote a small application as a way to exercise test driven development. The purpose of this application is to record names and phone numbers and allow user to look for names and phone numbers. See the Code

Spring
I built a website using Spring MVC, JSP, JQuery, Hibernate, and JPA. See the Code

Cruftbuster
Cruftbuster is a software that organizes files in a Linux-based operating system, which delete unused files and categorize files automatically. Cruftbuster is written in Python and tested in Ubuntu. See the Code
